cn show entrusted keys

Shows all entrusted keys.

cn entrust ACCOUNT*
cn entrust ACTOR on STORE

Adds the indicated entrusted keys. Entrusted keys can read our private data and messages. The public key of the entrusted actor must be available on the store.

cn do not entrust ACTOR*

Removes the indicated entrusted keys.

After modifying the entrusted keys, you should "cn announce" yourself to publish the changes.

Syntax

Open
